Whenever a player casts a spell without asking your permission while casting it, counter that spell.
When a player asks you permission to cast a spell and you refuse, counter that spell and sacrifice Common Courtesy.
flavor_text: "You didn't say the Magic word."

name: Clam Session
oracle_text:
As Clam Session enters the battlefield, choose a word.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may sing at least six words of a song, at least one of which is the chosen word. If you don't, sacrifice Clam Session. You can't repeat a song.
flavor_text: "Duke, Duke, Duke, Duke of Pearl . . . ."

name: Clam-I-Am
oracle_text: If you roll a 3 on a six-sided die, you may reroll that die.
flavor_text: The Clams down in Clamville All scootered and skittled— "The three is no more" The Clam fiddler fiddled.

name: Clambassadors
oracle_text: Whenever Clambassadors deals damage to a player, choose an artifact, creature, or land you control. That player gains control of that permanent.
flavor_text: "Sorry we shelled your village—here's some gold."

name: Chicken à la King
oracle_text:
Whenever a 6 is rolled on a six-sided die, put a +1/+1 counter on each Bird. (You may roll dice only when instructed to.)
Tap an untapped Bird you control: Roll a six-sided die. (Like now.)
flavor_text: During the Chicken Revolution, the king managed to keep his head while the others—well, just ran around.

name: Checks and Balances
oracle_text:
Cast this spell only if there are three or more players in the game.
Whenever a player casts a spell, each of that player's opponents may discard a card. If they do, counter that spell.

name: Censorship
oracle_text:
As Censorship enters the battlefield, choose a word.
Whenever a player says the chosen word, Censorship deals 2 damage to that player.
flavor_text: Editor's note: There were no suitable flavor text submissions for this card.

name: Bureaucracy
oracle_text:
Pursuant to subsection 3.1(4) of Richard's Rules of Order, at the beginning of the upkeep of each participant in this game of the Magic: The Gathering® trading card game (hereafter known as "PLAYER"), that PLAYER performs all actions in the sequence of previously added actions (hereafter known as "ACTION QUEUE"), in the order those actions were added, then adds another action to the end of the ACTION QUEUE. All actions must be simple physical or verbal actions that a player can perform while sitting in a chair, without jeopardizing the health and security of said PLAYER.
When any PLAYER does not perform all the prescribed actions in the correct order, sacrifice Bureaucracy and said PLAYER discards their complement of cards in hand (hereafter known as "HAND").

name: Sex Appeal
oracle_text: Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of targets, divided as you choose. If there are more people in the room of a different gender than you are as you cast this spell, prevent the next 6 damage this way instead.

name: Prismatic Wardrobe
oracle_text: Destroy target nonartifact, nonland permanent that doesn't share a color with clothing worn by its controller.
flavor_text: "Spring in Dominaria means pastels" —Excerpt from Mage's Home Journal

name: Once More with Feeling
oracle_text:
Exile all permanents and all cards from all graveyards. Each player shuffles their hand into their library, then draws seven cards. Each player's life total becomes 10. Exile Once More with Feeling.
DCI ruling — A deck can have only one card named Once More with Feeling.
flavor_text: If yo . . . ted.

name: Miss Demeanor
oracle_text:
Flying, first strike
At the beginning of each other player's upkeep, you may compliment that player on their game play. If you don't, sacrifice Miss Demeanor.
flavor_text: Even war can be civil.

name: Mesa Chicken
oracle_text: Stand up, Flap your arms, Cluck like a chicken: Mesa Chicken gains flying until end of turn.
flavor_text: "Lo lord of layers proudly comb-crested Hero to hens father to feathers Crowing sun-caller weaver of wattle Elder to eggs." —Rooster Saga

oracle_text: Ban a card other than a basic land card for the rest of the match. (All cards with that name in any zone or sideboard are removed from the match.)

oracle_text: Whenever Lexivore deals damage to a player, destroy target permanent other than Lexivore with the most lines of text in its text box. (If two or more cards are tied, target any one of them.)

Plucking the chicken
—Elvish expression meaning "flinging the monkey"

oracle_text:
First strike

Put your right foot in. Shake it all about. Repeat this process for your left foot, right arm, left arm, and whole self.)

Enchant creature

Buyback {3} (You may pay an additional {3} as you cast this spell. If you do, put this card into your hand as it resolves.)

oracle_text:
Cumulative upkeep—Pay 2 life. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on this permanent, then sacrifice it unless you pay its upkeep cost for each age counter on it.)
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to creatures you control.
flavor_text: "Save me from Maraxus," Starke pleaded, "or condemn me to his wrath. Either way, do not ignore me!"

name: Heavy Ballista
oracle_text: {T}: Heavy Ballista deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor_text: "Archers, ballistae—you can't even get near the island of Avenant." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Guided Strike
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "If you can kill your enemy with the first stroke, you save yourself the labor of the second." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Gerrard's Wisdom
oracle_text: You gain 2 life for each card in your hand.
flavor_text: "Fighting without an army is called a duel, and you'll lose a duel if your enemy comes expecting a war." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Foriysian Brigade
oracle_text: Foriysian Brigade can block an additional creature each combat.
flavor_text: "A double-edged sword lets you cut down your enemies with the backswing as well." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Empyrial Armor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each card in your hand.
flavor_text: "An angel appeared in the smoldering skies above the fray, her clothes as flames, her armor as fire." —"Hymn of Angelfire"

name: Duskrider Falcon
oracle_text: Flying, protection from black
flavor_text: "Seaborne ships have their dolphins to dance in their wakes; I have my duskriders." —Sisay, journal

name: Debt of Loyalty
oracle_text: Regenerate target creature. You gain control of that creature if it regenerates this way.
flavor_text: "I killed him because I had to," Starke lied to Gerrard. "But now I pledge my loyalty to you."

name: Benalish Missionary
oracle_text: {1}{W}, {T}: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target blocked creature this turn.
flavor_text:
"These horn-haters say no gods but theirs exist. I say let him find out for himself—right now!"
—Tahngarth of the Weatherlight

name: Benalish Knight
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text: "We called them 'armored lightning.'" —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Benalish Infantry
oracle_text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor_text: "My favorite part of getting into the infantry was getting out again." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Aura of Silence
oracle_text:
Artifact and enchantment spells your opponents cast cost {2} more to cast.
Sacrifice Aura of Silence: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

name: Argivian Find
oracle_text: Return target artifact or enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "We often bury our pasts, and then someone comes along and digs them up." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Ardent Militia
oracle_text: Vigilance
flavor_text: "While the rest of us got paid to serve the Benalish army, the militia didn't. I used to say they stood for freedom—free and dumb." —Gerrard of the Weatherlight

name: Angelic Renewal
oracle_text: Whenever a creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may sacrifice Angelic Renewal. If you do, return that card to the battlefield.

name: Alms
oracle_text: {1}, Exile the top card of your graveyard: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
flavor_text: "Helping people is mostly a matter of teaching them to help themselves." —Sisay, journal

name: Alabaster Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Alabaster Dragon dies, shuffle it into its owner's library.

name: Abeyance
oracle_text:
Until end of turn, target player can't cast instant or sorcery spells, and that player can't activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: "I'm too modest a wizard to reveal the full extent of my abilities." —Ertai, wizard adept

name: Xantcha
oracle_text: Sacrifice a permanent: Regenerate target creature.
flavor_text: A Phyrexian "sleeper agent," Xantcha has developed an inviolate sense of self. This aberration earned her a death sentence, but she was rescued by Urza and joined his crusade. Her Phyrexian credo of "Waste not, want not" has helped Urza more than even he comprehends.

name: Urza
oracle_text: {3}: Urza deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: An artificer of unparalleled renown, Urza was a powerful cipher even before he was able to planeswalk. Seeing the world as a large, integrated machine is his greatest strength and weakness, enabling him to solve almost any problem but blinding him to his solutions' effects on others.

name: Titania
oracle_text: You may play an additional land on each of your turns.
flavor_text: Voice of the Argoth forest, defender of its creatures, and enforcer of its laws, Titania is literally an aspect of the forest itself. Her power and her very existence are linked to the land: when the forest is healthy, Titania is ascendant. When Argoth suffers, Titania also bleeds.

name: Tawnos
oracle_text: You may cast artifact, creature, and enchantment spells as though they had flash.
flavor_text: Tawnos brings a childlike wonder and an inherent skill to Urza's studio and bridges the wizardry of the workshop with the grandeur of the royal court. His speed and flexibility quickly earned him promotion from apprentice to master artificer.

name: Serra
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +0/+2.
flavor_text: Named for a benevolent goddess at birth, Serra fulfilled the prophecy of that goddess's coming. As a planeswalker, she embodies white mana and helps whole civilizations develop while both directly and indirectly inspiring countless individuals to be steadfast and strong in the service of light.

name: Mishra
oracle_text: If a creature you control would deal damage, it deals double that damage instead.
flavor_text: Both complement and antithesis to his older brother Urza, Mishra also mastered the intricacies of artifice. It was Mishra's strength that first gave rise to the massive Phyrexian war engines on Dominaria, and it was his weakness that pushed him, Urza, and Dominaria itself to the point of annihilation.

name: Gix
oracle_text: {3}: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Through ruthlessness and raw ambition, Gix rose through the Phyrexian regime to the exalted rank of praetor. Even while overseeing many of Phyrexia's most important undertakings, Gix continues his own quest for supremacy . . . for in Phyrexia, the weak become fodder for the strong.

name: Ashnod
oracle_text: Whenever a creature deals damage to you, destroy it.
flavor_text: Ashnod served as Mishra's confidante while he led Fallaji weapons development before the Brothers' War. Whereas Mishra works in metals and stone, however, Ashnod works in living flesh. She sees all living things as prototype machines; her "improvements" to them make her as feared by allies as by enemies.

name: Takara
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Takara deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Takara banishes the shadow of her father's ignoble reputation through the dedication, plain speaking, and swift action of a warrior. By refusing Starke's path of self-interest and opportunism, she has learned what he never will know: the value of sacrifice for a worthy cause.

name: Sliver Queen, Brood Mother
oracle_text: {3}: Create a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token.
flavor_text: Though long held captive beneath Volrath's stronghold, the sliver queen is actually freer than most of Rath's denizens. Her maternal instincts always take precedence—even when they conflict with the evincar's agenda—and through her numerous litters, she ranges across all of Rath.

name: Sidar Kondo
oracle_text: {3}: Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Kondo served as guardian to the infant Gerrard and raised him alongside his own son, Vuel. He taught both boys to be strong and to lead, but whereas Gerrard became a champion of honor, Vuel's bitterness led him to become an equally devastating force of malice.

name: Rofellos
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control dies, draw a card.
flavor_text: Gerrard's longtime friend and fellow student under the maro-sorcerer Multani, Rofellos is an excellent warrior and excellent company. Though adept at both magic and swordplay, he's far more comfortable with a flagon in his hand and a good companion at his side.

name: Oracle
oracle_text: {0}: Untap target attacking creature you control and remove it from combat.
flavor_text: Known simply by her title, Oracle uses her gift of prophecy to aid her people. She believes Gerrard to be the Korvecdal, the one who will unite the people of Rath against Volrath's tyranny. Her only doubt is whether she will be strong enough to guide him to his destiny.

name: Multani
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +X/+0, where X is the number of cards in your hand.
flavor_text: In mentoring apprentice mages, the forest spirit Multani teaches each to respect nature while making use of its gifts. Multani taught Gerrard, Mirri, and Rofellos to hone their spellcasting in tandem with more physical disciplines so that both would be improved.

name: Lyna
oracle_text: Creatures you control have shadow. (They can block and be blocked only by creatures with shadow.)
flavor_text: One of the few Soltari who can cross the shadow barrier, Lyna serves as an emissary to the outside world. A quick thinker and convincing speaker, she does whatever she can to lead her people out of the shadows and into substance.

name: Eladamri
oracle_text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature you control is dealt to you instead.
flavor_text: Proud, shrewd, and charismatic, Eladamri has a commitment to his people that is absolute. The guerilla war he wages against Volrath has convinced him that the only way to liberate the Skyshroud elves is to lead all Rath's refugees to freedom. So be it.

name: Volrath
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, you may put it on top of your library.
flavor_text: The son of Gerrard's surrogate father, Sidar Kondo, Volrath stole Gerrard's Legacy and rose to power selling it off piece by piece. Now, he is an evincar, or agent, of the Lord of the Wastes. Armed with exceptional magical powers, he plots to conquer the entire multiverse.

name: Starke
oracle_text: At the beginning of your draw step, you may draw an additional card. If you do, put a card from your hand on the bottom of your library.
flavor_text: Starke believes in situational ethics—the situation determines the ethics. He's switched sides so often that he has become everyone's ally yet no one's friend. This former merchant of Rath accompanies the Weatherlight crew on their journey to his home world.

name: Selenia
oracle_text: Creatures you control have vigilance.
flavor_text: Once a guardian of Crovax's estate, Selenia was freed from her magical bindings by the wealthy noble. Instead of remaining at his side, the angel chose to venture out into the world. For reasons unknown to Crovax, Selenia now serves the evil Volrath in his home realm of Rath.

name: Orim
oracle_text: Creatures you control have reach.
flavor_text: Trained in the Samite arts, Orim serves as the healer aboard the Weatherlight. She is quick with languages and was educated at the same Argivian university as Hanna. A student by nature, Orim keeps a diary of all her new discoveries—both physical and spiritual—during her travels.

name: Hanna
oracle_text: Spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor_text: Educated in Argive and highly knowledgeable in the field of artifacts, this expert navigator of the Weatherlight believes that scholarship does not necessarily lead to understanding. Her diligence in pursuing both is her greatest asset.

name: Greven il-Vec
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control deals damage to a creature, destroy the other creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: As a ruthless leader for Volrath, Greven il-Vec serves his lord by commanding the flying ship Predator. Greven has attained his powerful rank through a series of underhanded schemes and assassinations, the majority of which were blessed by Volrath himself.

name: Crovax
oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control deals damage to a creature or player, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: How does one escape a curse? For Crovax, a wealthy noble, the answer may lie in joining the crew of the Weatherlight as they seek to rescue their abducted captain Sisay. Secretly, he hopes in his journeys to find Selenia, the angelic being who abandoned him and his family years ago.

name: Barrin
oracle_text: Sacrifice a permanent: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: An old and powerful wizard living on the mysterious isle of Tolaria, Barrin is the teacher who trained the young Ertai. He is also Hanna's father, but for reasons known only to the two of them neither acknowledges the other—or their strained relationship.

name: Tahngarth
oracle_text: Creatures you control have haste.
flavor_text: Tahngarth, first mate of the Weatherlight under Sisay, knows that there are really only two forms of life: the ugly ones and the minotaurs. A narcissist, he considers the condition of his hide as important as the accuracy of his blade.

name: Squee
oracle_text: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.
flavor_text: The smartest—and only—goblin cabin boy aboard the Weatherlight, Squee has learned that intelligence and common sense are very different things. This matters little, however, since he has neither. Fortunately, he doesn't know what he's missing.

name: Sisay
oracle_text: Whenever you tap a land for mana, add one mana of any type that land produced.
flavor_text: While captain of the Weatherlight, Sisay undertook a quest for the Legacy, a collection of artifacts needed to defeat the Lord of the Wastes. She continued this quest even when Gerrard, heir to the Legacy, chose to abandon it. Sisay is devoted to the cause of good at whatever price.

name: Mirri
oracle_text: If a basic land you control is tapped for mana, it produces mana of a color of your choice instead of any other type.
flavor_text: Mirri and Gerrard have been the best of friends since they trained together under the maro-sorcerer Multani. A fierce and agile warrior, she rejoined Gerrard aboard the Weatherlight as his unofficial first mate shortly after he assumed command of the flying ship.

name: Maraxus
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+0.
flavor_text: Too chaotic for even the other warlords of Keld, Maraxus has devoted himself to serving as a hired killer for the sinister Volrath. A man fond of his work, he's more than willing to put in those extra hours needed to perfect his craft.

name: Karn
oracle_text: Each noncreature artifact you control is an artifact creature with power and toughness each equal to its converted mana cost.
flavor_text: Both part of the Legacy and an individual in his own right, the silver golem Karn is haunted by a single, terrible incident: while serving to protect the young Gerrard, Karn accidentally took the life of another. Wakened from years spent as a statue, the golem has vowed to never kill again as he rejoins Gerrard.

name: Gerrard
oracle_text: At the beginning of your draw step, draw an additional card.
flavor_text: Soldier. Adventurer. Heir to the Legacy. Gerrard has, over the years, traveled much of Dominaria in search of fortune and glory. Now, after serving nobly in the Benalish army, he has returned to the Weatherlight to serve as captain in Sisay's absence and to take up the battle against the Lord of the Wastes.

name: Ertai
oracle_text: Creatures you control have hexproof. (They can't be the targets of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
flavor_text: After serving his apprenticeship under Barrin of Tolaria, Ertai graced the Weatherlight crew with his presence as the ship's "resident" wizard. He realizes that few recognize his greatness—but then how could they, when they lack his insight and wisdom?

name: Snapping Drake
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Drakes claim to be dragons—until the dragons show up.

name: Feral Shadow
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Not all shadows are cast by light—some are cast by darkness.

name: Armored Pegasus
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Asked how it survived a run-in with a bog imp, the pegasus just shook its mane and burped.

name: Wood Elves
oracle_text: When Wood Elves enters the battlefield, search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Winter's Grasp
oracle_text: Destroy target land.
flavor_text: Winter settles on the land, and the land prays it will wake.

name: Willow Dryad
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: Some think that dryads are the dreams of trees.

name: Whiptail Wurm
flavor_text: It's hard to say for certain which end is more dangerous.

name: Untamed Wilds
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Treetop Defense
oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Creatures you control gain reach until end of turn. (They can block creatures with flying.)

name: Thundering Wurm
oracle_text: When Thundering Wurm enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a land card.

oracle_text: Search your library for a creature card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

name: Summer Bloom
oracle_text: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.
flavor_text: Summer sends its kiss with warmth and blooming life.

name: Stalking Tiger
oracle_text: Stalking Tiger can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text: No one is happy when they notice a tiger.

name: Spined Wurm
flavor_text: It has more teeth than fit in its mouth.

name: Rowan Treefolk
flavor_text: One of the forest's best protectors is the forest itself.

name: Redwood Treefolk
flavor_text: The soldiers chopped and chopped, and still the great tree stood, frowning down at them.

name: Primeval Force
oracle_text: When Primeval Force enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice three Forests.

name: Plant Elemental
oracle_text: When Plant Elemental enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice a Forest.

name: Panther Warriors
flavor_text: The dogs of war are nothing compared to the cats.

name: Needle Storm
oracle_text: Needle Storm deals 4 damage to each creature with flying.

name: Nature's Lore
oracle_text: Search your library for a Forest card and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: Nature's secrets can be read on every tree, every branch, every leaf.

name: Nature's Cloak
oracle_text: Green creatures you control gain forestwalk until end of turn. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)

name: Natural Spring
oracle_text: Target player gains 8 life.
flavor_text: Though many have come to this place to wash their wounds, the water has never turned red.

name: Natural Order
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a green creature.
Search your library for a green creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

name: Moon Sprite
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: "I am that merry wanderer of the night." —William Shakespeare, A Midsummer Night's Dream

name: Monstrous Growth
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Some cats are born fighters; others need a little persuading.

name: Mobilize
oracle_text: Untap all creatures you control.
flavor_text: A rested mind is the sharpest weapon.

name: Jungle Lion
oracle_text: Jungle Lion can't block.
flavor_text: The lion's only loyalty is to its hunger.

name: Hurricane
oracle_text: Hurricane deals X damage to each creature with flying and each player.

name: Grizzly Bears
flavor_text: Don't worry about provoking grizzly bears; they come that way.

name: Gorilla Warrior
flavor_text: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.

name: Giant Spider
oracle_text: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: It's not far into the trap, as the crow flies.

name: Fruition
oracle_text: You gain 1 life for each Forest on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Come to these woods and suffer no pain; you've burdens to lose and new life to gain.

name: Elvish Ranger
flavor_text: It's up to you if you enter their woods—and up to them if you leave.

name: Elven Cache
oracle_text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Elves know where to harvest the best of the forest, for they planted it themselves.

name: Elite Cat Warrior
oracle_text: Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
flavor_text: "Hear that? No? That's a cat warrior."

name: Deep Wood
oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn by attacking creatures.

name: Charging Rhino
oracle_text: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.
flavor_text: A rhino rarely uses its horn to announce its charge, only to end it.

name: Bull Hippo
oracle_text: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)
flavor_text: Stay alert: his lumbering may shake the ground itself, but in water, he glides.

name: Bee Sting
oracle_text: Bee Sting deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: There are few things as motivating as a swarm of bees.

name: Anaconda
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: Something soft bumped against the rowboat, then was gone.

name: Alluring Scent
oracle_text: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
flavor_text: Doom rarely smells this sweet.

name: Winds of Change
oracle_text: Each player shuffles the cards from their hand into their library, then draws that many cards.

name: Wall of Granite
oracle_text: Defender (This creature can't attack.)
flavor_text: The wisest man builds his house behind the rock.

name: Volcanic Hammer
oracle_text: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Cast the weight as though it were a die, to see a rival's fate.

name: Volcanic Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

name: Thundermare
oracle_text:
Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
When Thundermare enters the battlefield, tap all other creatures.

name: Stone Rain
oracle_text: Destroy target land.
flavor_text: I cast a thousand tiny suns— Beware my many dawns.

name: Spitting Earth
oracle_text: Spitting Earth deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

name: Scorching Winds
oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Scorching Winds deals 1 damage to each attacking creature.

name: Scorching Spear
oracle_text: Scorching Spear deals 1 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Lift your spear as you might lift your glass, and toast your enemy.

name: Rain of Salt
oracle_text: Destroy two target lands.
flavor_text: It pelts the land with its fury, spoiling what was once sweet.

name: Raging Minotaur
oracle_text: Haste
flavor_text: The only thing worse than a minotaur with an axe is an angry minotaur with an axe.

name: Raging Goblin
oracle_text: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)
flavor_text: Charging alone takes uncommon daring or uncommon stupidity. Or both.

name: Raging Cougar
oracle_text: Haste
flavor_text: Mountaineers quickly learn to travel with their spears always pointed up.

name: Pyroclasm
oracle_text: Pyroclasm deals 2 damage to each creature.
flavor_text: Chaos does not choose its enemies.

name: Pillaging Horde
oracle_text: When Pillaging Horde enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a card at random.

name: Mountain Goat
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text: Only the heroic and the mad follow mountain goat trails.

name: Minotaur Warrior
flavor_text: The herd's patience, the stampede's fury.

name: Lizard Warrior
flavor_text: Don't let its appearance frighten you. Let its claws and teeth do that.

name: Lava Flow
oracle_text: Destroy target creature or land.
flavor_text: People ran as never before at the thought of being buried and cremated at the same time.

name: Lava Axe
oracle_text: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Swing your axe as a broom, to sweep away the foe.

name: Last Chance
oracle_text: Take an extra turn after this one. At the beginning of that turn's end step, you lose the game.

name: Hulking Goblin
oracle_text: Hulking Goblin can't block.
flavor_text: The bigger they are, the harder they avoid work.

name: Hulking Cyclops
oracle_text: Hulking Cyclops can't block.
flavor_text: Anyone can get around a cyclops, but few can stand in its way.

name: Hill Giant
flavor_text: Hill giants are mostly just big. Of course, that does count for a lot!

name: Highland Giant
flavor_text: Though slow-witted and slow-moving, they are quick to anger.

name: Goblin Bully
flavor_text: It's easy to stand head and shoulders over those with no backbone.

name: Forked Lightning
oracle_text: Forked Lightning deals 4 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three target creatures.

name: Flashfires
oracle_text: Destroy all Plains.
flavor_text: Dry grass is tinder before the spark.

name: Fire Tempest
oracle_text: Fire Tempest deals 6 damage to each creature and each player.

name: Fire Snake
oracle_text: When Fire Snake dies, destroy target land.
flavor_text: The snake's final thrashings only spread the fire within it.

name: Fire Imp
oracle_text: When Fire Imp enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to target creature.

name: Fire Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Fire Dragon enters the battlefield, it deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

name: Earthquake
oracle_text: Earthquake deals X damage to each creature without flying and each player.

name: Devastation
oracle_text: Destroy all creatures and lands.
flavor_text: There is much talk about the art of creation. What about the art of destruction?

name: Desert Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Never doubt a dragon just because of its size.

name: Craven Giant
oracle_text: Craven Giant can't block.
flavor_text: "The best armor is to keep out of range." —Italian proverb

name: Burning Cloak
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Burning Cloak deals 2 damage to that creature.

name: Boiling Seas
oracle_text: Destroy all Islands.
flavor_text: What burns the land, boils the seas.

name: Blaze
oracle_text: Blaze deals X damage to any target.
flavor_text: Fire never dies alone.

name: Wicked Pact
oracle_text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures. You lose 5 life.

name: Virtue's Ruin
oracle_text: Destroy all white creatures.
flavor_text: All must fall, and those who stand highest fall hardest.

name: Vampiric Touch
oracle_text: Vampiric Touch deals 2 damage to target opponent or planeswalker and you gain 2 life.
flavor_text: A touch, not comforting, but of death.

name: Vampiric Feast
oracle_text: Vampiric Feast deals 4 damage to any target and you gain 4 life.
flavor_text: It's not always gold the thief is after.

name: Undying Beast
oracle_text: When Undying Beast dies, put it on top of its owner's library.

name: Soul Shred
oracle_text: Soul Shred deals 3 damage to target nonblack creature. You gain 3 life.
flavor_text: It would be a shame to let life slip away to nothing.

name: Skeletal Snake
flavor_text: They watched as the snake shed layer after layer until only cold bone remained.

name: Skeletal Crocodile
flavor_text: The less flesh there is, the more teeth there seem to be.

name: Serpent Warrior
oracle_text: When Serpent Warrior enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

name: Serpent Assassin
oracle_text: When Serpent Assassin enters the battlefield, you may destroy target nonblack creature.

name: Raise Dead
oracle_text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The earth cannot hold that which magic commands.

name: Rain of Tears
oracle_text: Destroy target land.
flavor_text: When emotions rain down, what rivers will be born?

name: Python
flavor_text: What could it have swallowed to grow so large?

name: Noxious Toad
oracle_text: When Noxious Toad dies, each opponent discards a card.

name: Nature's Ruin
oracle_text: Destroy all green creatures.
flavor_text: One chill blast—the exhalation of the grave.

name: Muck Rats
flavor_text: The difference between a nuisance and a threat is often merely a matter of numbers.

name: Mind Rot
oracle_text: Target player discards two cards.

name: Mind Knives
oracle_text: Target opponent discards a card at random.
flavor_text: To dodge the unerring knife, one must be free of thought.

name: Mercenary Knight
oracle_text: When Mercenary Knight enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you discard a creature card.

name: King's Assassin
oracle_text: {T}: Destroy target tapped creature. Activate this ability only during your turn, before attackers are declared.
flavor_text: Fear is as effective a weapon as the blade.

name: Howling Fury
oracle_text: Target creature gets +4/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: I howl my soul to the moon, and the moon howls with me.

name: Hand of Death
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
flavor_text: Death claims all but the darkest souls.

name: Gravedigger
oracle_text: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Final Strike
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Final Strike deals damage to target opponent or planeswalker equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

name: Endless Cockroaches
oracle_text: When Endless Cockroaches dies, return it to its owner's hand.

name: Ebon Dragon
oracle_text:
Flying
When Ebon Dragon enters the battlefield, you may have target opponent discard a card.

name: Dry Spell
oracle_text: Dry Spell deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text: A fist of dust to line your throat, a bowl of sand to fill your belly.

name: Dread Reaper
oracle_text:
Flying
When Dread Reaper enters the battlefield, you lose 5 life.

name: Dread Charge
oracle_text: Black creatures you control can't be blocked this turn except by black creatures.
flavor_text: "As equal were their souls, so equal was their fate." —John Dryden, "Ode to Mrs. Anne Killigrew"

name: Cruel Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.
flavor_text: The more you pay for the lesson, the better you'll remember it.

name: Cruel Bargain
oracle_text: Draw four cards. You lose half your life, rounded up.

name: Craven Knight
oracle_text: Craven Knight can't block.
flavor_text: "I say victory is better than honor."

name: Charging Bandits
oracle_text: Whenever Charging Bandits attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The fear in their victims' eyes is their most cherished reward.

name: Bog Wraith
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: It moved through the troops leaving no footprints, save on their souls.

name: Bog Raiders
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text: Those who live amid decay must expect scavengers.

name: Bog Imp
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Don't be fooled by their looks. Think of them as little knives with wings.

name: Assassin's Blade
oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during the declare attackers step and only if you've been attacked this step.
Destroy target nonblack attacking creature.

name: Arrogant Vampire
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: Charm and grace may hide a foul heart.

name: Withering Gaze
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You draw a card for each Forest and green card in it.

name: Wind Drake
oracle_text: Flying
flavor_text: "No bird soars too high, if he soars with his own wings." —William Blake, The Marriage of Heaven and Hell

name: Touch of Brilliance
oracle_text: Draw two cards.
flavor_text: Acting on one good idea is better than hoarding all the world's knowledge.

name: Time Ebb
oracle_text: Put target creature on top of its owner's library.
flavor_text: Like the tide, time both ebbs and flows.

name: Tidal Surge
oracle_text: Tap up to three target creatures without flying.
flavor_text: "'Twas when the seas were roaring With hollow blasts of wind . . . ." —John Gay, "The What D'Ye Call It"

name: Thing from the Deep
oracle_text: Whenever Thing from the Deep attacks, sacrifice it unless you sacrifice an Island.
flavor_text: Seafarers fear sailing off the world's edge not so much as down its gullet.

name: Theft of Dreams
oracle_text: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.
flavor_text: Energy is never lost, only transformed.

name: Taunt
oracle_text: During target player's next turn, creatures that player controls attack you if able.

name: Symbol of Unsummoning
oracle_text:
Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: ". . . inviting the soul to wander for a spell in abysses of solitude . . . ." —Kate Chopin, The Awakening

name: Storm Crow
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text: Storm crow descending, winter unending. Storm crow departing, summer is starting.

name: Sorcerous Sight
oracle_text:
Look at target opponent's hand.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Do not react; anticipate.

name: Prosperity
oracle_text: Each player draws X cards.
flavor_text: "Life can never be too good."

name: Phantom Warrior
oracle_text: Phantom Warrior can't be blocked.
flavor_text: The phantom warrior comes from nowhere and returns there just as quickly.

name: Personal Tutor
oracle_text: Search your library for a sorcery card and reveal that card. Shuffle your library, then put the card on top of it.

name: Owl Familiar
oracle_text:
Flying
When Owl Familiar enters the battlefield, draw a card, then discard a card.

name: Omen
oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library.
Draw a card.
